title: 96x7: Post-Government Employment Bar under 18 U.S.C. § 207(a)(1)
summary: The OGE determined that for purposes of 18 U.S.C. § 207, an organization's study and agency A and B's rule making were part of the same mandate, and thus were part of the same particular matter. The OGE also concluded the employee's participation was personal and substantial.
